ValidationRule.description: If Closure Code starts with 'Abated' the Penalty & Interest Paid field minus Penalty & Interest recovered field must be less than or equal to 0.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($RecordType.Name = "Reference PAC Record Type" ), ( (Penalty_Interest_Paid__c - Penalty_Interest_Recovered__c) > 0.00 ), (BEGINS(TEXT(Closure_Code__c),'Abated') ), ($Profile.Name <>"System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If the Closure Code starts with Abated, the Penalty & Interest Paid field minus Penalty & Interest Recovered field must be less than or equal to 0.
